channel.title: Comments on: Cruisin’
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: jenny
item.dc:creator: jenny
item.description: ok, now i'm curious. there must be pictures.
item.content:encoded: ok, now i’m curious. there must be pictures.

item.title: By: Mischa

item.description: The masses demand photos of your quite-possibly-not-yet-pimped-out vehicle!
item.content:encoded: The masses demand photos of your quite-possibly-not-yet-pimped-out vehicle!

item.title: By: CarMax Chris
item.dc:creator: CarMax Chris
item.description: My name is Chris and I am the social media PR guy at the CarMax home office in Richmond, VA. Google Alerts notified me of your blog posting mentioning us. I love to read blogs from happy customers! Iâ€m glad you had a great experience at one of our stores. I hope you tell your friends to visit a store or www.carmax.com!

I love to read blogs from happy customers! Iâ€™m glad you had a great experience at one of our stores. I hope you tell your friends to visit a store or http://www.carmax.com!

item.title: By: Monica
item.dc:creator: Monica
item.description:
oh, oh, pictures!!!!
It sounds like you and I are travelling the same paths... my car got booted this week, and I had to pay to get it out, pay for parking tickets, and finally register it in CA. Wayyyyy expensive. I went and test drove two cars and also found out Sallie Mae (the thugs) were dinging my credit pretty badly with my late student loan payments! So I got my old car all legal and will be trying to fix my credit so I can buy a new car later this year or early next year. My Subaru is a 1990 and I have 260,000 miles on it, so it's definitely time...
item.content:encoded:
oh, oh, pictures!!!!

It sounds like you and I are travelling the same paths… my car got booted this week, and I had to pay to get it out, pay for parking tickets, and finally register it in CA. Wayyyyy expensive. I went and test drove two cars and also found out Sallie Mae (the thugs) were dinging my credit pretty badly with my late student loan payments! So I got my old car all legal and will be trying to fix my credit so I can buy a new car later this year or early next year. My Subaru is a 1990 and I have 260,000 miles on it, so it’s definitely time…
